}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[[Rivet Networks]] '''NGFF535A-L''' 2×2 11ac Wireless Adapter with BT 4.1 :802.11ac 2T2R, Wave2 MU-MIMO, TxBF, 300/867Mbps (2.4/5GHz) {{see also|Rivet Networks|Lite-On|Lite-On WCBN808A}}
===Specifications=== *NGFF (Next Generation Form Factor) M.2, 22x30mm ([http://www.lian-mueller.com/img/NGFF525A-L_Pic.jpg Key A/E]) *Chipset: QCA6174A, 2×2 MU-MIMO with two spatial streams *Single-chip, 2.4/5 GHz, 2 stream 802.11abgn/ac and BT 4.1 :802.11ac 2x2 WLAN, LP PCIe (L1 sub-state) + BT 4.1 (USB 1.1) *Supports 20/40MHz (2.4GHz) and supports 20/40/80MHz (5GHz) *Bluetooth 4.1 solution for class1/2 power-level transmissions :Support BT 4.1 + HS, BLE, ANT+ (compatible with BT 1.2, 2.x) :Supports Bluetooth-WLAN coexistence and ISM-LTE coexistence
==See also== *[[Rivet Networks NGFF505A]] – 802.11abgn/ac 1x1 WiFi + BT4.1 Module :[[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA435|QCA NFA435]](A) Chipset: QCA9377-5, NGFF M.2 (1630, Key A/E) :OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN806A]] / [[AzureWave AW-CB231NF]] *[[Rivet Networks NGFF525A]] – 802.11abgn/ac 2x2 WiFi + BT4.1 Module :[[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA344A|QCA NFA344A]](H) Chipset: QCA6174A, NGFF M.2 (2230, Key A/E) :OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN807A]] / [[Foxconn T77H644.01]] • [[Rivet Networks Killer Wireless-AC 1525|Wireless-AC 1525]] *[[Rivet Networks NGFF535A]] – 802.11abgn/ac 2x2 WiFi + BT4.1 Module :[[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA364A|QCA NFA364A]](H) Chipset: QCA6174A-5, NGFF M.2 (2230, Key A/E) :OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN808A]] / [[Foxconn T77H644.06]] • [[Rivet Networks Killer Wireless-AC 1535|Wireless-AC 1535]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
